item.description:
first meetup of 08






Venue: 7 one 1  Venue fee: $10 , from 10.30pm -11:00pm, please rvsp, so we can put you on the guess list.  Venue meeting place: "This meetup will take place near the sushi bar area of 7 one 1. When you walk down the stairs it is the bar to your left. Its obviously the smaller bar of the 2 bars that are in 7 one 1. Also there is a huge fish tank right near the bar. "
Venue Parking: Parking always available on newbury street
item.how_to_find_us: This meetup will take place near the sushi bar area of 7 one 1. When you walk down the stairs it is the bar to your left. Its obviously the smaller bar of the 2 bars that are in 7 one 1. Also there is a huge fish tank right near the bar.
item.why: just to have fun and meet some new people
item.name: FIRST MEETUP OF 08
